Trade/Device Name(s): cobas c 501 ISE Indirect Na, K, Cl for Gen. 2
Specimen Container(s): Plastic bottles closed via screw caps
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): cobas 6000 analyzer series with ISE module
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for cobas c 501 ISE Indirect Na, K, Cl for Gen. 2 assay with modified calibration for quantitative determination of sodium, potassium, and chloride in serum, plasma, and urine.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative determination of sodium, potassium, and chloride in serum, plasma, or urine using ion-selective electrodes to aid in diagnosis and treatment of electrolyte, metabolic, and hormonal disorders.
